= BASH =

== Colors ==
RED="\033[1;31m"
GREEN="\033[1;32m"
NOCOLOR="\033[0m"
echo -e "${RED} Do you want it to be REMOVED AUTOMATICALLY?${NOCOLOR}"

== For loop, repeat x times ==
for i in {1..15}; do <x>; done

== Get the numbers from a string ==
NUMBER=$(echo "I am 999 years old." | tr -dc '0-9')
